title: Reservation area beyond the slum boundary on open land / non slum area/ nalla shall have to be developed entirely for the intended purpose only
clause_text: Reservation area beyond the slum boundary on open land / non slum area/ nalla shall have to be developed entirely for the intended purpose only.
section: Development of reservation in Redevelopment for Rehabilitation of Slum Dwellers under Regulation No. 33(10)

source_pdf.text_snippet: Reservation area beyond the slum boundary on open land / non slum area/ nalla shall have to be developed entirely for the intended purpose only.
